content:
Anyway, if <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color> ever feels lost about life here,
don't hesitate,
just come ask me!

At the Camp, Mobai handles negotiations for Astralink construction,
Glenn sells useful items for daily life,
and buys things you don't need anymore.

We'll be staying at the RV camp.
Feel free to come by anytime
if you need to discuss anything.

Oh, it's <color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>!
Did you sleep well?

For the time being,
I'll be in charge of safety patrols along the Astralink,
just in case anything unexpected happens...

We're here to help you
24 hours a day.
Feel free to come to us
for any life matters.
